description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: The Paid Memberships Pro WordPress plugin before 2.12.9 does not prevent user with at least the contributor role from leaking other users' sensitive metadata.
El complemento Paid Memberships Pro de WordPress anterior a 2.12.9 no impide que el usuario con al menos el rol de colaborador filtre metadatos confidenciales de otros usuarios.
